controllers

Class ConsultPatientFileController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.ConsultPatientFileController

  • @PUBLICAPI
public class ConsultPatientFileController
extends java.lang.Object
    A controller that allows you to open patient files.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConsultPatientFileController(LoginController loginController)
      Default constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closePatientFile()
      Closes the patient file this doctor has opened.
      java.util.Collection<PatientFileIN> getAllPatientFiles()
      Use to list all patient files of patients who have ever been registered in this hospital.
      PatientFileIN getPatientFile() 
      void openPatientFile(PatientFileIN patientFile)
      Use to open the given patient file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConsultPatientFileController

        @PUBLICAPI
public ConsultPatientFileController(LoginController loginController)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        loginController - The login controller of the user that wants to consult a patient file.
        Throws:
        exceptions.InvalidLoginControllerException - If the user to whom the given login controller belongs to is not a doctor or invalid in any other way.
        exceptions.InvalidHospitalException
        See Also:
        HospitalController, NeedsLoginAndPatientFileController

    • Method Detail

      • getAllPatientFiles

        @PUBLICAPI
public java.util.Collection<PatientFileIN> getAllPatientFiles()
        Use to list all patient files of patients who have ever been registered in this hospital.

      • openPatientFile

        @PUBLICAPI
public void openPatientFile(PatientFileIN patientFile)
        Use to open the given patient file.
        Parameters:
        patientFile - The patient file you would like to open.

      • getPatientFile

        @PUBLICAPI
public PatientFileIN getPatientFile()
        Returns:
        The patient file that is opened with this ConsultPatientFileController.

      • closePatientFile

        @PUBLICAPI
public void closePatientFile()
        Closes the patient file this doctor has opened.
